sub_title: MSc. in Economics Graduate | Data Analyst, IT Business Consultant (Functional and Technical Knowledge) Data Science (Machine Learning Architectural, Technical, and Functional understanding), and Medtech Enthusiast
summary:
I am working as a Business Consultant for Canon Medical Systems Europe (CMSE) where I am responsible to manage and advise the service business domain. Prior to working in the Netherlands, I work for debt management startup company where I was responsible to manage documents, projects, credit report analysis and debt consultancy. Since I have backgrounds in research, machine learning, and data analysis, I was also responsible with research project (market and debt analysis, including writing up a research to be submitted to the financial authority). 

Possesses 2 years of experience in quantitative and qualitative research from Bachelor, working with professors, senior lecturers, and educators on research using Stata, R, and Excel. Taken several online and M.Sc. courses on finance, energy & environment, and data analytics using R and Python. In addition, 1.5 years of experience in finance (e.g., debt valuation, ﬁnancial analysis, and credit risk management) and energy & environment (e.g., fuel price comparison). Enthusiastic to dive deeper into the world of data analysis. 

IT experience including Oracle applications and architecture understanding and gaining experience in mobile application design and development (e.g., EBS, Oracle Service Cloud, Field Service Cloud, Intelligent Advisor, and Visual Builder Cloud Studio). Including knowledge on middleware integration implementation (CastIron and Boomi) and Salesforce support.   

#dataanalyst #financialanalyst #macroeconomist #python #excel #powerBI

volunteer_experiences.description:
Youth organization focusing on social issues. The organization work under the supervision of village level government to conduct various programs and events such as recording data of less fortunate people to be sent to town level govt.

•	Initiated surveys with an online data input system and designed a plan for government unconditional cash transfer distribution. 
•	Developed plans in distributing BLT-DD (unconditional cash transfers) recording.
•	Designed a plan and wrote a proposal presented to the government for a tourism village. The plan has already been started and made a significant social impact on local residents’ employment. 
•	Tracing people who have done interprovincial travel during the CoViD-19 pandemic (including safety measures and treatment for them).
Monitoring the lower level of the organization
Giving education on the danger of drugs
